FuncDef: The display port-queue configuration template command displays information about a port-queue template.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of a port-queue template.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters.

Examples: <HUAWEI> display port-queue configuration template verbose test
I-Weight(Inverse schedule weight used by TM)
A-Weight(Actual schedule weight obtained by users)
Port-wred(The name of the WRED object used by the port-queue)
C-Weight(Cir schedule weight configured by users)
P-Weight(Pir schedule weight configured by users)
Cos  Arith  U-Weight  I-Weight  A-Weight  Shp        Pct  Port-wred
Cos  Cir  C-Pct  C-Arith  C-Weight  Pir  P-Pct  P-Arith  P-Weight  Port-wred
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To check brief information about all port-queue templates, run the display port-queue configuration template command.
To check detailed information about all port-queue templates, run the display port-queue configuration template verbose command.
To check detailed information about a specified port-queue template, run the display port-queue configuration template verboseport-queue-name command.
Prerequisites
A port-queue profile has been created.
